description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43515) related to the Internet Small Computer Systems Interface (iSCSI), apply the relevant updated KB articles as outlined below:

1. Identify your Windows version and corresponding build number.
2. Download and install the appropriate update package from the links provided.
3. Restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the iSCSI denial of service issue by updating system components that manage resource consumption.
- Ensure that the system is running a compatible Windows 10 or 11 version as detailed.
- Download the updates from these links:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges to install updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with updates.
